Class ButtonAxis

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.inputs.ButtonAxis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAxis

    public class ButtonAxis
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAxis
    Axis composed of two buttons.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates an axis from two buttons.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ButtonAxis

        public ButtonAxis(IButton negative,
                  IButton positive)
        Creates an axis from two buttons.
        Parameters:
        negative - When this button is down, the axis is negative.
        positive - When this button is down, the axis is positive.

    • Method Detail

      • getAmount

        public float getAmount()
        Description copied from interface: IAxis
        Gets the current value along the axis. -1 is smallest input, 1 is largest input.
        Specified by:
        getAmount in interface IAxis
        Returns:
        The current value of the axis in the range (-1, 1).
